name: Shrek Horror Game... (DEMO)
description:
face shrek in his swamp and press z for flash light x for gun and space to die arrow keys to move also shrek full body appers then you cant do anything to get rid of him when head shrek appers use flashight when donkey army appers use gun to scare him then when donkey peaking appers move around so he does not call shrek to kill you

survive as long as possible beat my time 201 time

huge thanks to TrollGameStudios For A Lot Of This And Scott For Some Textures.

Inspired By FNAF And BATIM.
